verses.roman:
mora ślokera abhiprāya nā jāne kona jane
mora manera kathā tumi jānile kemane?

synonyms: mora—My; ślokera—of the verse; abhiprāya—purport; nā—does not; jāne—know; kona—any; jane—person; mora—My; manera—of mind; kathā—the intention; tumi—you; jānile—understood; kemane—how.
translation: "No one knows the purport of My verse," Caitanya Mahāprabhu said. "How could you understand My intention?"
